front.title: IP over ATM Working Group's Recommendations for the ATM Forum's Multiprotocol BOF Version 1
front.abstract: This document represents an initial list of requirements submitted to the ATM Forum's Multiprotocol BOF for the operation of IP over ATM networks as determined by the IETF IP over ATM Working Group and other working groups. This memo provides information for the Internet community. This memo does not specify an Internet standard of any kind.
